name: AskSaintLouisUniversity
0:
”Alexa, open Saint Louis University.”
”Alexa, ask Saint Louis University where can I stay for graduation.”
”Alexa, ask Saint Louis University where can I eat right now.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: saint louis university
des: The custom SLU Alexa skill provides instant answers to more than 100 questions specific to the University, from “What restaurants are open?” to “When will the bus arrive at Busch Student Center?” Alexa will also be able to provide information about campus, student organizations, and service and mission opportunities, among many other aspects of student life.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
